unit.name: Blood Claw Assaults
unit.notes: Counts as Tacticals für all transport purposes.

unit.name: Thunderwolf Cavalry
unit.notes: Counts as Terminators für the purpose of being transported.

unit.name: Death Kompanie Marines
unit.notes: Counts as Tacticals für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Long Fang Devastators
unit.notes: Count as Devastators für all transport purposes.

unit.name: Grey Hunter Tacticals
unit.notes: Count as Tacticals für all transport purposes.

unit.name: Wolf Guard Terminators
unit.notes: May be deployed in Drop Pods.

unit.name: Deathwing Knights
weapons: Maces of Absolution und Storm Shields

unit.name: Assault Centurions
unit.notes: Counts as Terminators für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Devastor Centurions
unit.notes: Counts as Terminators für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Sanguinary Guards
unit.notes: Counts as Assaults für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Speeder Storm
unit.notes: May transport eine unit of Aufklärers.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Venerable
unit.notes: May only be added to a Dreadnought unit of any configuration.

unit.name: Death Kompanie Dreadnought
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Mortis
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Deathwing
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Furioso
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Hellfire
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Ironclad
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Dreadnought, Siege
unit.notes: Counts as a Dreadnought für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Razorback
unit.notes: May transport eine Infanterie unit (except Terminators) without Jump Packs oder Beritten. Armed with either Synchronisierte Laserkanone oder Synchronisierter schwerer Bolter. Razorbacks armed with Synchronisierter schwerer Bolter have their firefight value increased to 4+.

unit.name: Blood Angels Razorback
unit.notes: May transport eine Infanterie unit (except Terminators) without Jump Packs oder Beritten. Armed with either Synchronisierte Laserkanone oder Synchronisierter schwerer Bolter. Razorbacks armed with Synchronisierter schwerer Bolter have their firefight value increased to 4+.

unit.name: Deathwatch Razorback
unit.notes: May transport eine Infanterie unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Vortimer Razorback
unit.notes: May transport eine Infanterie unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Rhino
unit.notes: May transport zwei Infanterie units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Blood Angels Rhino
unit.notes: May transport zwei Infanterie units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Siege Rhino
unit.notes: May transport zwei Infanterie units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Damocles Command Rhino
unit.notes: May transport eine Infanterie unit (except Terminators) without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Grey Knights Rhino
unit.notes: May transport zwei Infanterie units (except Terminators) without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport eine Terminator unit oder zwei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Land Raider Redeemer
unit.notes: May transport drei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten; Terminators count as eine und a half units jeweils, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Deathwing Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport eine Terminator unit oder zwei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Vortimer Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport eine Terminator unit oder zwei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Vortimer Land Raider Redeemer
unit.notes: May transport drei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten; Terminators count as eine und a half units jeweils, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Achilles
unit.notes: May transport eine Infanterie unit without Jump Packs oder Beritten. Counts as a Land Raider für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Anvilarum
unit.notes: May transport eine Dreadnought oder zwei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten. Counts as a Land Raider für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Crusader
unit.notes: May transport drei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten. Terminators count as eine und a half units jeweils, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Deathwatch Land Raider
unit.notes: May transport drei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten. Terminators count as eine und a half units jeweils, rounding up. Counts as a Land Raider für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Helios
unit.notes: Armed with either a Hyperios oder Whirlwind Launcher. May transport eine Infanterie unit (except a Terminator unit) without Jump Packs oder Beritten. Counts as a Land Raider für the purposes of being transported.

unit.name: Land Raider Prometheus
unit.notes: May transport eine Terminator unit oder zwei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Land Raider Wrath of Mjalnar
unit.notes: May transport eine Terminator unit oder zwei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten.

unit.name: Bastion
unit.notes: Must take either zwei Rapier Laser Destroyers oder zwei Thunderfire Cannons. A Bastion counts as a ruins terrain piece once destroyed.
unit.crit: The Bastion takes an extra point of damage.

unit.name: Fellblade
unit.crit: The Fellblade is destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on a 5+.

unit.name: Glaive
unit.crit: The Glaive is destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on a 5+.

unit.name: Deathwatch Landing Craft
unit.notes: May transport zwölf Infanteristen units, Attack Bikes oder Dreadnoughts; Terminators und Dreadnoughts count as zwei units jeweils; plus any sechs armoured vehicle units (except Dreadnoughts); Land Raiders count as eine und a half units jeweils, rounding up.
unit.crit: The unit und all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit.

unit.name: Grey Knights Landing Craft
unit.notes: May transport zwölf Infanteristen units oder Dreadnoughts; Terminators und Dreadnoughts count as zwei units jeweils; plus any sechs armoured vehicle units (except Dreadnoughts); Land Raiders count as eine und a half units jeweils, rounding up. Critical Hit Effect: The unit und all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on 4+.

unit.name: Stormwolf Assault Boat
unit.notes: May transport sechs Infanterie units without Beritten; Terminators und Dreadnoughts count as zwei units jeweils. Counts as a Landing Craft für the purposes of being transported.
unit.crit: The Stormwolf und all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Stormraven
unit.notes: May transport eine Terminator oder zwei Infanterie units without Beritten. May in addition transport eine Dreadnought. Counts as a Drop Pod für the purpose of being transported.

unit.name: Corvus Blackstar Dropship
unit.notes: May transport drei Infanterie units oder Attack Bikes. Terminators count as eine und a half units jeweils, rounding up. May in addition transport eine Dreadnought oder Land Speeder.

unit.name: Storm Eagle
unit.notes: May transport vier Infanterie units without Beritten; Terminators und Dreadnoughts count as zwei units jeweils. Counts as a Thunderhawk für the purpose of being transported.
unit.crit: The Storm Eagle und all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Darkwing Storm Eagle
unit.notes: May transport vier Infanterie units without Beritten; Terminators und Dreadnoughts count as zwei units jeweils.
unit.crit: The Storm Eagle und all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Thunderhawk
unit.notes: May transport acht Infanterie units, Attack Bikes; Terminators und Dreadnoughts count as zwei units jeweils.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk und all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry bis zu zwei of the following units: Stalkers, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos und Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as zwei units jeweils. In addition it may also carry any Infanterie transported in these vehicles, which counts as being located in the vehicles when disembarking.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter und all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Iron Hands Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry bis zu zwei of the following units: Dreadnoughts, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos, Stalkers und Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as zwei units jeweils. In addition it may also carry any Infanterie transported in these vehicles, which counts as being located in the vehicles when disembarking.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter und all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Deathwatch Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry bis zu zwei of the following units: Stalkers, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos und Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as zwei units jeweils. In addition it may also carry any Infanterie transported in these vehicles, which counts as being located in the vehicles when disembarking.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter und all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Grey Knights Thunderhawk Transporter
unit.notes: May carry bis zu zwei of the following units: Stalkers, Hunters, Predators, Razorbacks, Rhinos und Vindicators. Land Raiders counts as zwei units jeweils. In addition it may also carry any Infanterie transported in these vehicles, which counts as being located in the vehicles when disembarking.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk Transporter und all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Landing Craft
unit.notes: May transport zwölf Infanteristen units, Attack Bikes oder Dreadnoughts; Terminators und Dreadnoughts count as zwei units jeweils; plus any sechs armoured vehicle units (except H-AV, Dreadnoughts); Land Raiders count as eine und a half units jeweils, rounding up.
unit.crit: The Landing Craft und all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit.

unit.name: Hunter Class Destroyer
unit.notes: May transport vier Infanterie units. These may only deploy on to the battlefield using Teleport.

unit.name: Dark Hunter Class Destroyer
unit.notes: May transport vier Infanterie units. These may only deploy on to the battlefield using Teleport. May in addition transport fünf Corvus Blackstars und drei Thunderhawk Transporters along with any units these transport.

unit.name: Vanguard Class Light Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport 12 Infanterie units, Attack Bikes, oder Dreadnoughts; plus fünf light vehicles oder armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes und Dreadnoughts); plus zwei Thunderhawks und enough Drop Pods to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Strike Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport 20 Infanterie units, Attack Bikes, oder Dreadnoughts; plus 10 light vehicles oder armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes und Dreadnoughts); plus sechs Thunderhawks und enough Drop Pods oder Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Grey Knights Strike Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport 20 Infanterie units, Attack Bikes, Dreadnoughts; plus 10 light vehicles oder armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes und Dreadnoughts) ; plus 6 Thunderhawks/Storm Eagles und enough Drop Pods oder Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Battle Barge
specialRules: Slow to Arrive (May only arrive from turn 2 onwards)
unit.notes: May transport 30 Infanterie units, Attack Bikes, oder Dreadnoughts; plus 20 armoured vehicle units (except Attack Bikes oder Dreadnoughts); plus 9 Thunderhawks und enough Drop Pods oder Landing Craft to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Drop Pod
unit.notes: May transport eine formation of only the following units: Tacticals, Devastators, Dreadnought, Sternguard Veterans, Wolf Guard Terminators, Grey Knights Strike Squad, Grey Knights Purgation Squad. After the Drop Pod lands, its Deathwind attacks all enemy units within 15cm. Jeweils enemy formation attacked receives a Blast Marker für coming under fire, und an extra Blast Marker für jeweils casualty. Then any troops carried in the Drop Pod must disembark within 5cm of the Drop Pod oder within 5cm of another unit from the same formation that has already landed, so long as all units are placed within 15cm of the Drop Pod. Drop pod models should be removed from the board once the formation they transport has disembarked.

unit.name: Impulsor
unit.notes: May transport zwei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten. Aggressors und Eradicators counts as zwei units jeweils.

unit.name: Repulsor
unit.notes: May transport zwei Infanterie units without Jump Packs oder Beritten. Aggressors und Eradicators counts as zwei units jeweils.

unit.name: Astraeus
unit.crit: The Astraeus is destroyed. All units within 5cm suffer a hit on a 5+.
